column3: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday May 3 at 7:00 a.m.

column4: New Circle Rd at Newtown Pk
Lexington Police have issued a general traffic advisory for Friday May 3.
Expect delays in the areas of downtown/Rupp Arena, Keeneland, Blue Grass Airport, and Loudon Avenue.
Friday May 3 at Rupp Arena at 10 a.m. and 2 p.m.
Friday May 3 at the Singletary Center at 4 p.m. and 7 p.m.
Use added caution if traveling in these areas and watch for pedestrians.
